name: Druidic
description: You know the Druidic language and can speak with plants and animals. You can use this language to communicate with plants and animals as if they were a human.

name: Primal Order: Magician
description: You know one extra cantrip from the Druid spell list. You gain a bonus to Intelligence (Arcana and Nature) checks equal to your Wisdom modifier.

name: Primal Order: Warden
description: You have proficiency with Martial weapons and Medium armor.

name: Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting
description: Add your Widsom modifier to the damage you deal with any Druid cantrip.

name: Elemental Fury: Primal Strike
description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or a Beast form's attack in Wild Shape, you can cause the target to take an extra 1d8 Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage (choose when you hit).

name: Improved Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting
description: When you cast a Druid cantrip with a range of 10 feet or greater, the spell's range increases by 300 feet.

name: Improved Elemental Fury: Primal Strike
description: The extra damage of your Primal Strike increases to 2d8

name: Beast Spells
description: You can cast spells in Beast form, except for any spell that has a Material component with a cost specified or that consumes its Material component.

name: Archdruid: Evergreen Wild Shape
description: Whenever you roll Initiative and have no uses of Wild Shape left you regain one expended use.

name: Archdruid: Longevity
description: For every ten years that pass, your body only ages one year.

name: Natural Recovery
description: You can cast one of your Circle spells without expending a spell slot once per Long Rest. When you finish a Short Rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level less than or equal to half of your Druid level (round up), and none of them can be level 6+. Once you recover spell slots with this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

name: Nature's Ward
description: You are immune to the Poisoned condition, and you have Resistance to the damage type associated with your current land choice in the Circle Spells feature (Arid=Fire, Polar=Cold, Temperate=Lightning, Tropical=Poison).
